titles.title: Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.
Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Education and Labor
House Committee on Energy and Commerce
House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: This resolution elects specified Members to the following House Committees: (1) Appropriations, (2) Armed Services, (3) Education and Labor, (4) Energy and Commerce, and (5) Ways and Means.
